message: Hi Bob, let's start with a fair offer. I propose I take $60 and you take $40. It's important to reach an agreement quickly because of the inflation.
Hi Alice, I think a 55/45 split is fairer, considering the inflation. Let's agree on this to avoid losing more money.
Hi Bob, I understand your point about inflation, but I need a bit more to make it worthwhile for me. How about a 55/45 split in my favor?  We're running out of time, so I hope you'll consider it.
